fields.name: CHATEAU DE SAINT COSME
fields.description: The aromas of fruit and spice give one a hint of the light drinkability of this lovely wine, which makes an excellent complement to fish dishes.

fields.name: LAN RIOJA CRIANZA
fields.description: A resurgence of interest in boutique vineyards has opened the door for this excellent foray into the dessert wine market. Light and bouncy, with a hint of black truffle, this wine will not fail to tickle the taste buds.

fields.name: MARGERUM SYBARITE
fields.description: The cache of a fine Cabernet in ones wine cellar can now be replaced with a childishly playful wine bubbling over with tempting tastes of black cherry and licorice. This is a taste sure to transport you back in time.

fields.name: OWEN ROE "EX UMBRIS"
fields.description: A one-two punch of black pepper and jalapeno will send your senses reeling, as the orange essence snaps you back to reality. Don't miss this award-winning taste sensation.

fields.name: REX HILL
fields.description: One cannot doubt that this will be the wine served at the Hollywood award shows, because it has undeniable star power. Be the first to catch the debut that everyone will be talking about tomorrow.

fields.name: VITICCIO CLASSICO RISERVA
fields.description: Though soft and rounded in texture, the body of this wine is full and rich and oh-so-appealing. This delivery is even more impressive when one takes note of the tender tannins that leave the taste buds wholly satisfied.

fields.name: CHATEAU LE DOYENNE
fields.description: Though dense and chewy, this wine does not overpower with its finely balanced depth and structure. It is a truly luxurious experience for the senses.

fields.name: DOMAINE DU BOUSCAT
fields.description: The light golden color of this wine belies the bright flavor it holds. A true summer wine, it begs for a picnic lunch in a sun-soaked vineyard.

fields.name: BLOCK NINE
fields.description: With hints of ginger and spice, this wine makes an excellent complement to light appetizer and dessert fare for a holiday gathering.

fields.name: DOMAINE SERENE
fields.description: Though subtle in its complexities, this wine is sure to please a wide range of enthusiasts. Notes of pomegranate will delight as the nutty finish completes the picture of a fine sipping experience.

fields.name: BODEGA LURTON
fields.description: Solid notes of black currant blended with a light citrus make this wine an easy pour for varied palates.

fields.name: LES MORIZOTTES
fields.description: Breaking the mold of the classics, this offering will surprise and undoubtedly get tongues wagging with the hints of coffee and tobacco in perfect alignment with more traditional notes. Sure to please the late-night crowd with the slight jolt of adrenaline it brings.

fields.name: ARGIANO NON CONFUNDITUR
fields.description: Like a symphony, this cabernet has a wide range of notes that will delight the taste buds and linger in the mind.

fields.name: DINASTIA VIVANCO
fields.description: Whether enjoying a fine cigar or a nicotine patch, don't pass up a taste of this hearty Rioja, both smooth and robust.

fields.name: PETALOS BIERZO
fields.description: For the first time, a blend of grapes from two different regions has been combined in an outrageous explosion of flavor that cannot be missed.

fields.name: SHAFER RED SHOULDER RANCH
fields.description: The warm California sun doesn't hurt this flavorful chardonnay. Though you won't be able to lay this wine down for long, it does not disappoint.

fields.name: LOUIS CHEZE ST. JOSEPH ROUGE
fields.description: Dedicated to the refinement and good taste of the Rhone Valley, this syrah will make even the harshest reviewer take note of its bright notes of fruit and lilac.

fields.name: MOMO MARLBOROUGH
fields.description: Best served chilled with melon or a nice salty prosciutto, this sauvignon blanc is a staple in every Italian kitchen, if not on their wine list. Request the best, and you just may get it.

fields.name: SYLVAIN MOREY BOURGOGNE BLANC
fields.description: Hints of honeysuckle and a light minerality make this chardonnay a perfect companion to a sunny day. Let its freshness bring a smile to your lips.

fields.name: GUSTAVE LORENTZ RIESLING RESERVE
fields.description: With a surprising sweetness that is balanced by a hint of acidity, this Riesling is a wonderful pre-dinner drink that can also complement a light fish dinner.

fields.name: NEUDORF MOUTERE CHARDONNAY
fields.description: This Chardonnay will grab you with its toasty oak and buttery texture. A lovely way to end a day on a high note.

fields.name: DOG POINT SAUVIGNON BLANC
fields.description: Fresh and acidic, this wine captures the crisp taste of the best Sauvignon Blancs. Try with fresh oysters for an unforgettable experience.

fields.name: MARQUES DE MURRIETA RESERVA
fields.description: This aged wine has a velvety finish with the slight hint of tobacco. Pair with grilled meats for a delectable experience.
